  • Uses of SortStrategy in taskmanagement.application.viewmodel.sort

    Classes in taskmanagement.application.viewmodel.sort that implement SortStrategy
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    final class 
    SortById
    Sorting strategy that orders tasks by their unique identifier.
    final class 
    SortByState
    Sorting strategy that orders tasks by their lifecycle state in the sequence: TaskState.ToDo TaskState.InProgress TaskState.Completed
    final class 
    SortByTitle
    Sorting strategy that orders tasks by their title in case-insensitive lexicographic order.
